imdb.plot outline: Get ready for the biggest season yet with a sneak peek at the 6th season of the "Real Housewives of New Jersey!" Old friends return and new faces debut as Teresa and Joe struggle to keep their family together while facing the legal battle of their lives-- with nothing less than their freedom on the line! Veteran Housewife, Dina, returns to help Teresa through this difficult time, but reveals she has problems of her own-- a painful divorce looming on the horizon. Meanwhile, Melissa and her husband, Joe, risk everything to start a new business-collecting garbage. Adding to the chaos is Melissa's friend from the past, Amber, a New Jersey native and breast cancer survivor who stirs up trouble with help from her two friends, Nicole and Teresa, identical twins with over-the-top personalities and Neapolitan style. The six quickly form strong bonds, but rumors of shocking affairs and backstabbing soon threaten to tear their new friendships apart!
imdb.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey: Sneak Peek
akas: The Real Housewives of New Jersey: Sneak Peek (United States)
